name: ANNIHILATION (itch) (Inferno Interactive)
description:
ANNIHILATION is a game that was made for a game jam [Dreamhack Summer]. The game is done with the jam, and is now able to be sold. The game will be actively developed.

In ANNIHILATION you play as a scientist who had an experiment go wrong during a raid of robotic wizards! This experiment sent him, and the portals spawning the robots, into the western town of Tumbleweed! The year is 1893 and tumbleweeds are roaming the west! You must survive a practice wave, to make it into the fun part: ENDLESS! You must survive an endless wave of robotic hordes, that will have random delays in spawning. The West is rough, there are no healing items or ammo crates, and as such, you get your ammo maxed out every now and then during the infinite wave.

This game will be updated for quite a while, and these updates may include:

  • Turrets
  • Ability to play as a robot
  • Changes to the robots, and their AI
  • Kill streaks
  • Multiplayer
  • Achievements
  • Leaderboards
  • Tutorial Levels
  • More weapons

Make sure to stay tuned for these updates! Thanks!
